00038 ScanBlock::ScanBlock() : m_flags(0), m_scanner_id(-1) {
00039   m_iter = m_vec.end();

00046 int ScanBlock::load(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00047   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00048   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00049   uint32_t len;
00050 
00051   m_event_ptr = event_ptr;
00052   m_vec.clear();
00053   m_iter = m_vec.end();
00054 
00055   if ((m_error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00056     return m_error;
00057 
00058   try {
00059     m_flags = decode_i16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00060     m_scanner_id = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00061     len = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00062   }
00063   catch (Exception &e) {
00064     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00065     return e.code();
00066   }
00067   uint8_t *p = (uint8_t *)decode_ptr;
00068   uint8_t *endp = p + len;
00069   SerializedKey key;
00070   ByteString value;
00071 
00072   while (p < endp) {
00073     key.ptr = p;
00074     p += key.length();
00075     value.ptr = p;
00076     p += value.length();
00077     m_vec.push_back(std::make_pair(key, value));
00078   }
00079   m_iter = m_vec.begin();
00080 
00081   return m_error;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 bool ScanBlock::next(SerializedKey &key, ByteString &value) {
00086 
00087   assert(m_error == Error::OK);
00088 
00089   if (m_iter == m_vec.end())
00090     return false;
00091 
00092   key = (*m_iter).first;
00093   value = (*m_iter).second;
00094 
00095   ++m_iter;
00096 
00097   return true;
00098 }
